name: Candy Block Shooter HD Free
description:
Warning, this game is very addictive!

Really awesome match 3 or more blocks breaking game, where you are shooting blocks to up and try to match color of blocks. If you match 3 or more, then this break block that touching each other for this color and also blocks below. If you are able to clear whole table you get a bonus and time of new lines will increase. Also colors increasing when you get further on game, so try to clear table as often as you can.

[[[ Game is recommended for hole family ]]]

[ features ]

+ Fanstastic gameplay
+ Beautiful animation
+ Great for kids
+ Fun for many hours
+ Relaxing game


[ more games ]

We have also made other great games, so type ”codecube brothers” to itunes search field and you can find our other games, which are already available in the appstore! Happy gaming! :)

[ feedback ]

We can't answer messages that are written on reviews, so please send your feedback, wishes and bug reports to us support (at) ccbrothers (dot) com.
